summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Economic Development Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on May 6, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via videoconference, aiming to discuss various economic development initiatives and budgetary considerations for the upcoming fiscal year.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the March 26, 2024, special joint meeting and the April 1, 2024, Economic Development Committee meeting.
2. Briefings on the FY 24-25 budget for Convention & Event Services and Planning & Urban Design.
3. Discussion on the Media Production Development Zone for South Side Studios Dallas, LLC.
4. Monthly technology and metrics review from Development Services.
5. Partnership updates with the Small Business Administration.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will review significant proposals, including the upcoming agenda item concerning proposed amendments to the Shops at RedBird Project Development Agreement. Additionally, the meeting will feature briefings on the D CEO’s 2024 Commercial Real Estate Awards and the Dallas Business Journal’s 2024 Best Real Estate Deals.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the meeting minutes and will discuss budget allocations for various departments. They will also consider the proposed amendments for the Shops at RedBird Project Development Agreement, which requires committee endorsement before proceeding to the full council.
